triples.name: Citation
triples.relevance: The paper investigates citation behavior and whether cited papers were actually read by citers.

triples.name: Stochastic process
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a stochastic modeling approach to estimate citation reading rates.

triples.name: Zipf's law
triples.relevance: The paper explains empirical misprint distributions in citations as following Zipf's law.
